note.p: Career: Called to the Bar (1693); tried to prove that the Earl of Essex had been murdered (1683), for which he was imprisoned (1684-1689); Solicitor to the Wine Licence Office (1695)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Hunter; MT
Notes: Proposed by John Houghton. LI has Lawrence Braddon of Middlesex, Arm, admitted 1699
